title: DevOps Architect
description: Led the design and implementation of the company’s DevOps platform, collaborating with cloud engineers, leadership, and development teams to set standards and create training programs.
Partnered with senior leadership and an innovation team to build a robust, security-focused AI cloud platform.
Directed a groundbreaking AI project with the innovation team, utilizing technologies such as Semantic Kernel, Autogen, Azure AI Search, Snowflake, and Azure OpenAI.

title: Sr. Systems Engineer
description: Designed and optimized critical systems and infrastructure.
Migrated CI/CD pipeline management from Jenkins to GitLab.
Managed containerized applications with OpenShift.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Designed and built a scalable iOS-centric AI vision platform.
Developed a highly optimized cloud API using microservice architecture and container orchestration.
Implemented distributed cloud and edge computing methodologies.

title: Platform Architect
description: Shaped the technical foundation and direction of the platform.
Led development of full-stack solutions, including backend design, microservice development, and iOS application integration.
Managed end-to-end lifecycle of production deployments, ensuring the stability and scalability of NeuralStack.

title: Design Engineer
description: Led the design and development of engineering solutions, focusing on advancing the company’s product offerings.
Managed software development teams and guided them through complex design challenges.
Oversaw the creation of technical aspects of sales proposals and led design sprints to prepare for the launch of NeuralStack.

title: VP of Engineering
description: Spearheaded development and management of complex, multi-sensor machine vision systems.
Oversaw full lifecycle of product development, from concept to production.
Led the engineering team in implementing a patented pallet perception system.

title: Co-Founder
description: Guided the company through growth phases, focusing on scaling operations and optimizing product development.
Oversaw R&D and software development, setting strategic goals for efficient execution.
Managed key client relationships and ensured high standards of quality.

title: Software Development Manager
description: Led a team of developers in designing, implementing, and testing down-hole pump system control software.
Managed project and technical aspects, including simulator system development for operator training.
Developed e-commerce and web applications.

title: Optoelectronics Engineer
description: Assisted in developing digital vision systems and managing technology implementations.
Focused on developing low-cost digital night vision systems.
